text: Eteke yetiya sisuto te'omra pitrra saite calaphuraa karaa arasthata upanita ha’la, tetiya ibraahime ka’le, ‘he mora cenehara putra! Ma'i saponata dekhilo ye, ma'i tomaka yabeha karai acho, etiya koraacona tomara abhimata ki’? Putra'i ka’le, ‘he mora pitr! Apuni yi adesapraapta haiche se'itorae'i karaka. Allahara icchata apuni moka dhairyasila sakalara antarbhukta paba’
